lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. American Jewish Heritage/ Dialogue Forum deeply mourns the immense loss of our Honorary Chairman, mentor, teacher, friend. Across more than four decades he strongly supported with encouragement advice and help our work of fighting hatred, promoting Judaism, building a better world. We who survive him shall always continue the legacy he handed over to us. Rabbi Perry Berkowitz Rabbi Leah Berkowitz 1/3
